page.title: 09HOME LIFE
page.content:
THE SITUATIONS IN THE AREA VARY GREATLY ACCORDING TO THE AMOUNT OF MONEY COMING INTO EACH HOME.THE BEST CONDITIONS OCCUR IN BEARSDEN WHERE THE MOST MONEY IS COMING IN.
HOWEVER IN DRUMCHAPEL YOU HAVE SOME PEOPLE WHO ARE LIVING ON NEXT TO NOTHING.THATS NOT TO SAY THAT EVERYONE IN DRUMCHAPEL IS POOR. THERE ARE SOME PEOPLE WHO ARE QUITE WELL OFF HERE AS WELL,BUT NOT MANY.
IN TEMPLE AND KNIGHTSWOOD THINGS ARE NOT SO BAD WITH A HIGHER PERCENTAGE OF PEOPLE WORKING.
THE EFFECTS OF UNEMPLOYMENT ARE PUTTING GREAT STRAINS ON THE HOME ENVIRONMENT OF MANY PEOPLE IN THE AREA. EG DEPRESSION,DRUGS,DRINK.
